step_data.thought:
I notice that I've already filled in all the required fields for John Smith:
1. First Name: John
2. Last Name: Smith
3. Email: john.smith@example.com

And I clicked the 'Save Customer' button. However, looking at the current state of the page, I can see an error message: 'A customer with the same email address already exists in an associated website.' This means I cannot create a customer with the email john.smith@example.com because it's already in use.

Since I cannot proceed with this exact email address, I should inform the user about this issue.
step_data.action: stop('I cannot add a new customer named John Smith with the email john.smith@example.com because this email address is already in use by another customer in the system. To add this customer, you would need to use a different email address.')
